home.title: Home
home.excerpt: Artful Sphynx guardianship, couture care, and soulful adoption pathways.
home.content:
Miss Mermaid Sphynx · Vessels of Living Sculpture

We choreograph every breeding pairing like a gallery opening. Champion-bred Sphynx companions emerge from curated nutrition, temperature orchestration, and daily touchpoints that celebrate their emotive skin. Meet the artisans behind the whiskerless wonder and begin an adoption pathway that feels bespoke and attentive.

Explore Adoption With Heart
Review Our Care Blueprints

Champion Lineage

Our line is stewarded by DNA profiling, HCM screening, and a show circuit dossier that stretches across continents. Discover conformation notes, temperament observations, and the artistry of pairing in the Our Cats residence and learn why guardians return for a second companion on the Testimonials salon.

Art & Care

We choreograph their days with chromotherapy lighting, humidity control, and tactile enrichment that keep skin luminous and personalities confident. Map the rituals we teach guardians in the immersive Care Guide atelier and explore behind-the-scenes studio captures inside the Gallery vault.

Adoption with Heart

From curated introductions to three-month wellness follow-up, adoption is a conversation, not a transaction. Preview our five-step choreography on the Adoption pathway and bookmark the FAQ library for concierge-level responses.

Miss Mermaid Sphynx evolved from couture runway collaborations and a passion for preserving warmth-filled temperaments. We now curate no more than four litters annually, allowing every kitten to memorize human heartbeats, gentle grooming, and the cadence of home. Explore our narrative in the About chronicle and align with a guardian mentor before your kitten steps into your living room gallery.

Every visitor receives a tailored welcome sequence. Whether you are preparing climate zones, selecting hypoallergenic textiles, or designing enrichment corners, our concierge team pairs artistry with actionable science. Subscribe to our newsletter below to access seasonal rituals, and reserve a virtual studio tour to witness Wanda and Yoda rehearsing their morning stretches.

Concierge Highlights for First-Time Visitors

Begin with a private discovery call where we review lifestyle rhythms and align expectations. You will receive a personalised dossier summarising favourite enrichment, room temperature guidance, and links to the Care Guide so you can prepare tactile comforts before your kitten arrives.

Our welcome sequence also includes a digital mood board featuring knitwear palettes, scent therapy cues, and playlists that follow the cadence of our nursery. Families often print these visuals to create inspiration corners at home. Once you confirm interest, we schedule a virtual walk-through that introduces each resident and explains how we storyboard daily enrichment. The follow-up email contains direct access to the FAQ suite and alumni testimonials so you can review real-world experiences while planning your own.

For returning guardians, our concierge offers seasonal refreshers highlighting new nutrition discoveries, recommended travel accessories, and early notice of upcoming litters. These updates ensure your home evolves alongside your Sphynx companion’s needs, keeping artistry and wellbeing in harmony.

Studio Moments Captured

Preview two vignettes from our NextGEN archive — full collections await in the Gallery, with detailed lineage footnotes linked back to Our Cats.

[ngg src="galleries" ids="show-moments" display="basic_thumbnail" images_per_page="2" order_by="sortorder"]

Join the Velvet Current Newsletter

Receive curator notes, seasonal spa recipes, and early adoption announcements. We share no fluff, only the warmth you need to elevate life with a Sphynx companion.

[fluentform id="4"]

about.title: About
about.excerpt: The Miss Mermaid house story, selective artistry, and ethical breeding lens.
about.content:
Selective. Ethical. Artistic.

Miss Mermaid Sphynx was born backstage at fashion week, where our founder noticed models and creators magnetised to the regal confidence of a visiting Sphynx companion. Today we honour that spark with a boutique cattery that treats every kitten like a living sculpture destined for a discerning home.

Selective Pairings

We orchestrate no more than four litters annually, blending CFA Grand Champions with emerging prodigies who demonstrate affectionate eye contact, responsive vocalisations, and relaxed handling. Pedigree data is traced for ten generations, and our mentors in Our Cats annotate every nuance, from paw temperature to cuddle stamina.

Ethical Foundations

Transparency anchors our guardianship pledge. Prospective families tour our climate-zoned nursery virtually or in person, meet our veterinary technician, and receive detailed wellness metrics. We extend lifetime conversations, linking you with the Care Guide practice and our dedicated concierge desk on the Contact page.

Artistic Stewardship

Each environment is curated with tactile textiles, tonal palettes, and scent therapy that complements their hairless physique. Our collaborative artists capture their elegance for the Gallery, while bespoke knitwear designers keep bodies warm between spotlight moments.

Origin Story

Founder Mireya "Miss Mermaid" Solis apprenticed with European catteries before establishing our house in the Pacific Northwest. Inspired by sculptural water choreography, she designed habitats with floating platforms, warm airflow, and soothing playlists. These elements remain central to Wanda, Yoda, Dada, and Gogoda’s daily routines.

Our guardianship council includes a cardiologist monitoring hypertrophic cardiomyopathy markers, a feline nutritionist, and a behaviourist specialising in confidence training. Every specialist contributes to our adoption dossiers so families are never left guessing.

Differentiators

  • Immersive Orientation: Families receive a 90-minute onboarding covering bathing choreography, temperature staging, and travel preparation with direct links to the FAQ suite.
  • Concierge Wellness: Quarterly alumni salons feature case studies from the Testimonials gallery highlighting thriving matches.
  • Art Partnerships: Each kitten leaves with a miniature portrait and access to our digital styling library, curated alongside the Gallery team.
  • Holistic Nutrition: Our recipes blend raw and gently cooked menus tailored to each guardian’s lifestyle, supported by the nutrition strategies outlined in the Care Guide.

We honour every guardian who trusts us to expand their family. The Miss Mermaid pledge is simple: we raise companions who glow under the spotlights yet melt into a velvet cuddle. Continue exploring the living portfolio on Our Cats and ready your heart for the adoption pathway that best fits your rhythm.

our-cats.title: Our Cats
our-cats.excerpt: Meet Wanda, Yoda, Dada, and Gogoda — champions with soul and charisma.
our-cats.content:
The Miss Mermaid Ensemble

Each resident is a CFA-celebrated personality with an individual wardrobe, enrichment schedule, and guardian mentor. Dive deeper into their stories, then follow the links to our About atelier and the curated Gallery.

GC Miss Mermaid Wonderwave “Wanda”

Temperament: Velvet diplomat who melts into shoulders; leads newcomer socialisation.

Color: Blue-cream mink with opalescent undertones.

Lineage: Descendant of European Grand Champions with proven HCM-negative heritage. Wanda anchors our selective pairing program described on the Adoption page.

  • Signature Achievement: Triple-ring sweep at the Cascadia Feline Invitational with perfect grooming scores.
  • Favourite Enrichment: Weighted cuddle wrap paired with lavender-infused diffuser sessions.
  • Concierge Tip: Schedule evening bonding inspired by the rhythm we outline in the Care Guide.

RW QGC Miss Mermaid Luminous “Yoda”

Temperament: Mindful observer who chirps softly during grooming demos.

Color: Seal point with shimmering warmth.

Lineage: Blends Canadian show lines with a Mediterranean muse. Yoda’s mindfulness cues inform the routines shared on the Care Guide.

Signature Rituals: Sunrise stretch choreography, mindful breathing beside salt lamps, and guided cuddle meditations that we teach during step two of the Adoption journey.

CH Miss Mermaid Daring Muse “Dada”

Temperament: Playful provocateur who thrives on interactive puzzles.

Color: Red tabby with bronze undertones.

Lineage: Bold fusion of avant-garde Eastern European studs. Dada inspires enrichment modules featured in our FAQ insights.

  • Creative Playlists: Rotating jazz and synthwave sessions keep Dada’s curiosity engaged.
  • Training Notes: Clicker cues and scent trails form the backbone of our puzzle rotations.
  • Guardian Homework: Mirror Dada’s daily obstacle course using instructions in the Care Guide.

CH Miss Mermaid Golden Echo “Gogoda”

Temperament: Gentle storyteller who curls around wrists during quiet evenings.

Color: Cream and white bicolor with porcelain glow.

Lineage: Harmonises Scandinavian warmth with North American vigor. Gogoda’s alumni families share updates within the Testimonials studio.

Wardrobe Capsule: Gogoda favours cashmere capes, merino bodysuits, and reversible travel wraps. We share fit guides and care instructions during concierge consultations.

House Rituals & Guardian Pathways

Our ensemble thrives on predictability paired with creative enrichment. Guardians receive weekly rehearsal notes covering hydration, climate adjustments, and socialisation prompts. Use these alongside the Care Guide to create a nurturing environment that mirrors our studio.

  • Monday: Aroma therapy check-in followed by tactile play led by Wanda.
  • Wednesday: Interactive puzzle circuits inspired by Dada’s favourite obstacle course.
  • Friday: Velvet lounge storytelling with Gogoda, paired with mindfulness stretches from Yoda.

Families considering adoption can observe these rituals during virtual tours and replicate the cadence at home prior to kitten arrival. The deeper your alignment with our rhythm, the smoother your transition into lifelong guardianship.

Every Miss Mermaid resident mentors the next generation through cuddle rehearsals, sound conditioning, and car-ride simulations. Arrange a private introduction via the Contact suite and preview adoption steps on the Adoption page.

adoption.title: Adoption
adoption.excerpt: A five-step guardianship choreography designed for attentive families.
adoption.content:
Adoption with Heart

Our guardianship journey is paced so your household feels ready, resourced, and supported. We remain beside you from initial inquiry through lifelong alumni salons.

1. Curated Application

Share your home rhythm, travel cadence, and existing companions. We review your narrative alongside resources in the Care Guide to tailor recommendations.

2. Alignment Conversation

Meet our guardianship concierge via video tour. We showcase nursery zones, introduce Wanda or Yoda, and align expectations on grooming, nutrition, and budget.

3. Reservation Harmony

Once aligned, reserve your kitten with a signed guardianship charter. You receive weekly updates, scent swatches, and enrichment assignments.

4. Environment Rehearsal

We coach you on temperature zoning, skincare rituals, and emergency prep using templates from the FAQ archive and Care Guide.

5. Homecoming & Alumni Care

Your kitten travels with a couture wardrobe, nutrition plan, and veterinary dossier. Post-arrival, we schedule check-ins at one week, one month, and three months, plus invite you to share updates on the Testimonials lounge.

Adoption Investment

Investment begins at $3,800 USD, inclusive of HCM scanning, microchipping, baseline labs, spay/neuter, couture wardrobe, and lifetime concierge access. Families gain entry to alumni webinars covering bathing choreography, meal prepping, and seasonal wellness.

What to prepare before you apply: review bathing tools in the Care Guide, confirm local exotic veterinarians, and decide which resident (Wanda, Yoda, Dada, Gogoda) resonates. Our team loves matching energies.

Support Timeline & Guardian Touchpoints

From the moment your inquiry lands, our concierge documents every preference—ambient music, wardrobe styles, travel plans—and folds them into a personalised guardianship roadmap. Use this overview alongside the Care Guide to pace your household preparations.

  • Week 0: Application review, lifestyle alignment call, and curated reading list.
  • Week 2: Nursery livestream, temperature audit checklist, and grooming kit recommendations.
  • Week 4: Reservation confirmation, scent exchange, and virtual rehearsal featuring Wanda or Yoda.
  • Week 6: Homecoming logistics, travel carriers, and emergency contact protocols.
  • Post-arrival: Scheduled check-ins at days 7, 30, and 90 plus alumni salon invitation.

These milestones stay flexible; families can request additional sessions focused on nutrition, multi-pet introductions, or international travel. We map each appointment using Rank Math notes so nothing is missed.

Guardian Resources to Bookmark

  • FAQ Library — quick replies for grooming tools, travel paperwork, and emergency planning.
  • Testimonials Lounge — listen to alumni advice on setting emotional expectations.
  • Contact Concierge — request bespoke kits, bilingual support, or post-adoption mentorship.

Ready to Apply?

Complete the Adoption Inquiry form below. Expect a personal response within 48 hours. Curious minds can preview recurring questions inside the FAQ library.

[fluentform id="3"]

care-guide.title: Care Guide
care-guide.excerpt: Skin, nutrition, temperature, and health rituals for luminous Sphynx companionship.
care-guide.content:
The Miss Mermaid Sphynx Care Codex

A living manuscript designed for guardians who view their Sphynx companions as living art. Bookmark this resource and revisit before each season’s shift. For personalised guidance, speak with our team via the Contact portal or schedule an adoption consultation on the Adoption page.

Skin & Bathing Rituals

The Sphynx coat reveals every nuance of wellbeing. We frame bathing as a spa experience staged once per week. Begin by warming the bathroom to 78°F (25.5°C) and playing a familiar soundtrack. Pre-bathing, use hypoallergenic wipes to loosen oils in skin folds. Apply a gentle, fragrance-free cleanser diluted with warm water. Cradle your companion so the heart rests against your forearm; this lowers adrenaline and keeps their breathing steady. Rinse thoroughly, ensuring no residue hides behind ears or between toes. Follow with a microfiber towel wrap and a warm, low-flow blow dry. Finish the ritual with a botanical moisturiser approved by your vet to maintain the lipid barrier. Rotate exfoliating gloves every month to avoid microabrasions. For travel or show weeks, use dry-bath foams and soothing mitts to maintain glow.

Nail care integrates into the bathing sequence. Clip claws every ten days while offering lickable treats. Clean ear canals with vet-approved drops and cotton pads; never insert swabs. For paw pad conditioning, apply calendula balm before bedtime and let your Sphynx walk across a warm towel to absorb the product. These rituals support the grooming philosophies we demonstrate during adoption step two.

Sunlight deserves special attention. While natural light enhances mood, prolonged direct exposure can lead to sunburn. We recommend UV-filtering window films and sun-protective apparel tailored to your companion’s measurements. During summer, schedule enrichment activities around dawn or twilight. In winter, complement limited sunlight with full-spectrum lamps positioned at least three feet above resting zones.

Nutrition Architecture

Sphynx metabolism is a roaring furnace. Provide four to five micro-meals daily, balancing high-protein raw or gently cooked meals with moisture-rich broths. Our culinary blueprint pairs 65% muscle meat, 20% organs, 10% bone, and 5% botanicals rich in antioxidants. Rotate proteins—turkey, rabbit, quail, and responsibly sourced fish—to diversify amino acid profiles. Supplement with taurine, omega-3 DHA, and vitamin E under veterinary guidance. Hydration is key: install multiple water features, from ripple fountains to shallow ceramic dishes warmed slightly to mimic fresh prey temperature.

For kibble supplementation, select grain-free, high-meat recipes free from rendered by-products. Store in airtight containers away from sunlight to protect nutrients. Once weekly, offer goat milk kefir or bone broth for gut health. Monitor body condition using rib palpation and energy observation. If weight fluctuates, consult our nutritionist through the Contact desk. Senior companions may benefit from joint-support supplements and softer textures; kittens thrive on calorie-dense formulas aligned with our adoption dossiers.

Temperature & Environment

A Sphynx thrives between 72°F and 80°F (22-27°C). Invest in smart thermostats, thermal mats, and layered bedding to maintain warmth. Zone your home: create basking corners near windows with draft guards, establish play arenas with soft foam flooring, and build quiet lounges with weighted blankets. Rotate knitwear to prevent skin fatigue—lightweight bamboo blends for day, plush fleece for stargazing nights.

Humidity affects comfort. Maintain 45-55% relative humidity to balance skin hydration without encouraging mildew. Use essential oil diffusers cautiously; many oils are unsafe for cats. Instead, rely on gentle humidifiers paired with frequent cleaning. During warmer months, offer cooling tiles and chilled ceramic bowls. In cooler months, pre-warm carriers and car seats before travel. Positive reinforcement—treat trails and gentle affirmations—helps companions associate temperature adjustments with celebration.

Environmental enrichment prevents boredom. Introduce climbing sculptures, puzzle feeders, and scent discovery baskets rotated weekly. Encourage vertical exploration with cat-safe shelving and hammocks. Pair enrichment with the interactive cues described on the Our Cats showcase, where each resident models favourite games.

Health & HCM Awareness

Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) screening forms the backbone of our breeding program. We perform baseline echocardiograms at 12 months, repeat them annually, and share results with families. Guardians should schedule follow-up scans every 18-24 months or upon veterinary recommendation. Observe for subtle changes: altered breathing cadence, reduced play endurance, or digestive shifts. Promptly consult your cardiologist if anything feels unusual.

Routine wellness includes quarterly exams during the first year post-adoption, transitioning to biannual visits for adults. Vaccinate according to your vet’s risk assessment, with particular attention to upper respiratory protection. Dental care is non-negotiable: implement daily tooth brushing with enzymatic toothpaste and schedule prophylactic cleanings. Microchip registration should be updated annually, especially before travel.

Mental wellbeing mirrors physical health. Watch for signs of anxiety—overgrooming, excessive vocalisation, or hiding. Create predictable rituals, offer companion cards carrying your scent, and integrate play that mirrors natural hunting cycles. If stress surfaces, revisit the soothing techniques detailed in our FAQ and connect with the guardianship team through the Adoption pathway for tailored support.

Seasonal Checklist & Ritual Planning

Seasonal shifts influence humidity, daylight, and mood. Prepare a quarterly checklist that aligns with your regional climate. Begin each season by auditing thermostat schedules, verifying garment fit, and refreshing enrichment toys. Rotate knitwear palettes—linen blends for spring, breathable bamboo for summer, plush fleece for winter—and store them in breathable garment bags to preserve texture.

  • Spring: Introduce allergy protocols, deep-clean humidifiers, and schedule dermatology consults.
  • Summer: Increase hydration stations, add cooling tiles, and apply vet-approved sun protection.
  • Autumn: Transition to hearty broths, recalibrate heating pads, and rehearse travel carriers ahead of holiday visits.
  • Winter: Layer bedding, monitor humidity nightly, and book cardiology check-ins if travel is planned.

Document each adjustment in a shared family planner. This visibility keeps household members aligned and gives pet sitters clarity when you are away. We provide editable templates during concierge calls; request them via the Contact portal.

Travel & Integration Protocols

Introduce carriers as safe havens weeks before any trip. Leave the carrier open with warmed blankets and scatter treats inside. Practice short rides combined with positive reinforcement so your Sphynx associates travel with comfort. When flying, request cabin placement and carry a vet-certified acclimation letter. Store emergency contact cards in your travel wallet and in the carrier pocket.

For homes with other pets, stage scent exchanges using blankets and slow introductions through baby gates. Maintain separate feeding zones during the first fortnight. Observe body language closely—relaxed ears, steady breathing, and gentle vocalisations signal progress. Consult the FAQ for troubleshooting or book a behaviourist session through our concierge.

The Miss Mermaid Care Codex evolves with every alumni insight. Share your discoveries in the Testimonials studio and inspire future guardians to elevate daily life for their velvety muses.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.excerpt: Concierge answers to the questions asked by discerning guardians.
faq.content:
Frequently Asked Questions

Curated answers gathered from guardian conversations. Continue exploring the adoption story on the Adoption page and study deeper care rituals via the Care Guide.

How often should I bathe my Sphynx?

Plan weekly spa rituals using lukewarm water and fragrance-free cleansers. Supplement with midweek wipe-downs. Refer to the Skin & Bathing section in our Care Guide for product recommendations and step-by-step choreography.

Do Sphynx cats get cold easily?

They enjoy warmth between 72°F and 80°F. Layer knitwear, provide thermal mats, and schedule sun time responsibly. The Temperature chapter outlines zoning tips.

What diet do you recommend?

Four to five micro-meals blending raw and gently cooked recipes with hydration support. Explore ratios and supplements in the Nutrition Architecture section.

How do you screen for HCM?

We partner with board-certified cardiologists for annual echocardiograms. Adoptive families receive scan records and reminders in our newsletter. See the Health & HCM Awareness notes.

Can I meet the kittens before adoption?

Yes, via virtual studio tours or curated in-person visits. Schedule through the Contact page after completing the Adoption Inquiry.

What comes in the adoption kit?

Wardrobe pieces, nutrition plan, vet dossier, scent blanket, and access to alumni salons. Preview the full list on the Adoption page.

Are Sphynx cats hypoallergenic?

No cat is fully hypoallergenic, but our grooming rituals and nutrition reduce dander. We coach you on environmental prep in the Care Guide.

How do you socialise kittens?

Daily cuddle rehearsals, sound desensitisation, and structured play led by Wanda and Yoda. Watch snippets in the Gallery.

Do you offer post-adoption support?

Absolutely. We host check-ins at one week, one month, and quarterly thereafter. Alumni receive invite-only tutorials and can share stories within the Testimonials lounge.

How do I reserve a kitten?

Start with the Adoption Inquiry form, review the guardianship charter, and place your reservation. The Adoption page walks through each step.

What if I need travel guidance?

Our concierge provides bespoke travel kits, cabin acclimation routines, and vet paperwork. Reach out via the Contact portal for personalised support.

What kind of support do you offer international adopters?

We provide bilingual liaisons, time zone friendly check-ins, and custom travel dossiers. Our concierge partners with your veterinarian to manage import requirements and acclimation plans. Use the Contact portal to request a tailored briefing.

How do you prepare kittens for children or other pets?

Kittens practice gentle handling with supervised play and confidence-building exercises guided by our behaviourist. Families receive integration scripts sourced from the Care Guide so introductions feel calm and celebratory.

Do you offer boarding or retreat services?

Yes. Alumni can reserve spots at our wellness retreat featuring climate-controlled suites, daily enrichment classes, and live video updates. Contact us via the Contact page to check availability.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.excerpt: Alumni families share their Miss Mermaid stories and luminous everyday joy.
testimonials.content:
Stories from Our Velvet Alumni

Every tale reflects the adoption choreography described on the Adoption page and the daily rituals mastered through our Care Guide.

The Atelier Loft · Wanda x Elise

Elise, a textile artist, says Wanda’s presence transformed her studio: “She perches on the loom bench, eyes half-closed, listening to jazz as if critiquing every warp and woof. The Miss Mermaid team coached me on humidifying the space without damaging fabric, and Wanda rewards us with twilight cuddle critiques.”

Elise adds that the concierge follow-ups helped her integrate seasonal nutrition tweaks and align Wanda’s skincare schedule with photoshoot demands. “Their notes bridged the gap between artistic intuition and clinical expertise,” she explains.

The Skyline Home · Yoda x Amir & Devon

Amir and Devon live in a high-rise overlooking the bay. “Yoda wakes us for sunrise yoga, stretching with perfect form. The concierge team’s travel kit made cabin flights effortless. We now mentor new guardians by sharing our routines in the alumni salon.”

They host quarterly virtual gatherings where alumni exchange playlists, thermal layering tips, and enrichment ideas inspired by Yoda’s mindfulness sessions. “The community feels like a design collective dedicated to feline wellbeing,” Amir notes.

The Garden Estate · Dada & Gogoda x Tran Family

The Tran family adopted bonded duo Dada and Gogoda. “They sprint through our botanical greenhouse and collapse beneath the radiant floor heating. Miss Mermaid’s nutrition counsel keeps their energy balanced, and the gallery portrait session captured their sibling choreography beautifully.”

Their children helped craft enrichment mazes modelled after the Our Cats profiles. “Miss Mermaid encouraged us to document successes and speed bumps so future families can iterate faster,” the family shares.

Alumni Concierge Circle

Graduates receive quarterly salons hosted by our guardianship team. Sessions cover seasonal nutrition tweaks, artistry collaborations, and philanthropic partnerships supporting feline cardiology research. Members also access a private resource library with grooming tutorials, travel templates, and curated playlists.

  • Monthly Office Hours: Submit questions ahead of time and receive personalised video replies.
  • Resource Drops: Downloadable checklists and enrichment guides aligned with the Care Guide.
  • Spotlight Opportunities: Feature in our Gallery refresh or collaborate on artist residencies.

If you would like to join the circle, indicate your interest within the story form or message the concierge directly via the Contact page.

Submit Your Story

Ready to share your Sphynx muse? Complete the story form so we can celebrate your companion in the Gallery and inspire future guardians visiting the About studio.

[fluentform id="5"]

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.excerpt: NextGEN-curated vignettes: show moments, art creations, everyday joy.
gallery.content:
NextGEN Gallery

Select a collection below and enjoy the immersive lightbox. Each gallery references notes from the Our Cats dossier and stories in the Testimonials lounge.

Show Moments

High-energy captures from international rings featuring precision poses, couture harnesses, and gleaming trophies. Each frame is annotated with judge commentary, grooming notes, and the musical cues our residents respond to backstage. Hover over the images to reveal captions describing lineage highlights and the season each victory was secured.

[ngg src="galleries" ids="show-moments" display="basic_masonry" images_per_page="12" order_by="sortorder"]

Art Creations

Collaborations with painters, textile artists, and sculptors who translate Sphynx grace into tangible art. Expect process shots, mood boards, and quotes from the creatives who shadowed our companions for a week. Tap each slide to open artist commentary, plus links back to the About atelier for deeper context about our creative partnerships.

[ngg src="galleries" ids="art-creations" display="basic_slideshow" images_per_page="10" order_by="sortorder"]

Everyday Joy

Quiet snapshots of sunbathing mornings, bedtime rituals, and the laughter-filled couches of alumni families. You will find annotations describing room temperature, favourite enrichment tools, and nutrition pairings so you can recreate the ambience at home. Alumni can request updates by messaging the concierge through the Contact page.

[ngg src="galleries" ids="everyday-joy" display="basic_thumbnail" images_per_page="18" order_by="sortorder"]

How to Experience the Collections

  • Desktop: Use full-screen mode for detailed texture studies and compare colour grading between show lighting and studio ambiance.
  • Mobile: Enable portrait orientation for everyday vignettes and landscape for show captures to enjoy proportional cropping.
  • Chromecast & AirPlay: Stream the slideshow to curate ambience during gatherings or pre-adoption consultations.

Each gallery set is optimised for fast loading via Imagify compression while preserving tonal depth suited to our black-and-gold aesthetic. Should you need high-resolution files for press or large-format printing, note the image ID and request it via the Contact concierge.

We refresh the collections every quarter and archive seasonal favourites within alumni newsletters. Share your home vignettes through the Testimonials form for a chance to be featured in Everyday Joy.

Curation Notes & Commission Process

Every collection is storyboarded by our creative director in partnership with alumni families. We chart lighting, texture, and mood before the shoot, ensuring each image conveys the warmth central to Miss Mermaid. Guardians receive mood boards ahead of time so wardrobes and props complement the black-and-gold aesthetic.

Collectors or brands seeking bespoke visuals can commission limited-series sessions. Share your concept, intended medium, and timeline via the Contact concierge. We pair you with our art team, secure studio time, and craft a usage plan covering gallery rights, social media, and print campaigns.

  • Portfolio Review: Receive sample galleries categorized by lighting style and subject focus.
  • Pre-Production Call: Align on story arc, wardrobe palette, and NextGEN presentation format.
  • Delivery: Access high-resolution files, optimized web sets, and alt text suggestions to support accessibility.

We refresh NextGEN galleries quarterly, archiving previous seasons in Rank Math-controlled sitemap segments for SEO continuity. Subscribe to the newsletter on the Home page to catch behind-the-scenes releases before public launch.

contact.title: Contact
contact.excerpt: Connect with the Miss Mermaid guardianship concierge team.
contact.content:
Speak with Our Guardianship Team

Book a virtual nursery tour, request lineage dossiers, or coordinate alumni check-ins. Before writing, browse the FAQ for quick answers and review adoption steps on the Adoption page.

Concierge Desk

Email: hello@sphynx.localtest.me

Studio Hours: Tuesday–Saturday, 10am–6pm PT

Virtual Tours: Bookings available within 7 days of inquiry. Pair with our Gallery preview to curate your wishlist.

General Contact Form

[fluentform id="6"]

Response Timeline

  • Adoption Inquiries: Personal reply within 48 hours with a curated call invitation.
  • Media Requests: Production kit and brand assets shared within 72 hours.
  • Alumni Support: Priority hotline open daily for wellness updates, with concierge call-backs the same day.

When your message arrives, our concierge references your dossier and coordinates with veterinary, nutrition, and behaviour teams as needed. Expect a follow-up checklist that links back to the Care Guide and FAQ for quick implementation.

Visit & Collaboration Notes

Our studio sits near the waterfront arts district. Once your visit is confirmed, you receive parking instructions, scent-neutral wardrobe recommendations, and a map of the nursery zones you’ll explore.

Fashion houses, photographers, and wellness professionals partner with us for curated shoots. Share your concept, mood boards, and timelines so we can align them with Wanda, Yoda, Dada, or Gogoda’s comfort windows.

International guardians may request a bilingual liaison; we currently support English, Spanish, and Mandarin walkthroughs. We also provide recorded sessions for household members who cannot attend live.

Studio Map & Travel Notes

Our studio sits minutes from the waterfront arts district and offers private parking validated for two hours. When you arrive, expect ambient lighting tuned to feline comfort and curated playlists that mirror the nursery soundscape. Guardians receive a printed visitor guide outlining scent-neutral wardrobe tips and no-flash photography etiquette.

International visitors often stay at partner hotels equipped with humidity control and pet-friendly amenities. Request our hospitality list through the Contact concierge so we can coordinate room aromatics and temperature ahead of arrival.

Virtual attendees receive a 360-degree tour link with optional closed captions and multi-language narration. We recommend joining from a quiet, warm space so your future companion recognises your voice during follow-up scent exchanges.

For adoption status checks, refer to your personalised dossier shared after application. Alumni seeking to submit stories can use the Testimonials form. Media and event collaborations go through Mireya’s studio desk. If you require urgent care triage outside studio hours, follow the emergency protocol outlined in your guardianship charter and notify us via the form so our on-call team can assist.
